name: TOP Table Of Contents
author: BoomDevs

sections.description:
Introducing TOP Table of Contents, the WordPress plugin that allows you to easily add an SEO-friendly & Best Table of Contents to your WordPress posts and pages, making your site more appealing to your visitors and improving your site’s overall impression on Google. It Makes it easy for visitors to find the content they need on your site.

TOP Table of Contents is the perfect plugin for content-rich websites. It automatically inserts the best Table of Contents into your posts and pages, making it easier for readers to find what they’re looking for. Plus, the SEO-friendly code ensures that your website will rank higher on search engine results pages. With TOP Table of Contents, you can also choose to exclude certain headings, change the font and color, and more.

TOP Table of Contents supports SEO and responsiveness. It works seamlessly on any device or browser! Also, it enhances your site’s SEO, and Google will use SEO Friendly code to display rich snippets on the result page. Also trusted by many WordPress users as the best Table of Contents Plugin for WordPress.

✨ Elevate your content with TOP Table of Contents

🎨 Stunning Templates

🖌️ Unlimited Customization

🚀 Sticky TOC On Scroll

🌊 Floating TOC & Navigation

📊 Progress Bar at Top

Features

  • Designed for Gutenberg & other page builders.
  • Auto Insert TOC into posts or pages.
  • Manually insert TOC by shortcode.
  • Compatible with posts, pages, and any other public post types.
  • Show headings at the depth you specify (From H2 to H4).
  • Toggle Show/Hide Options.
  • SEO Friendly.
  • Support Rank Math.
  • Insert with shortcodes, Gutenberg blocks, or widgets.
  • 3 Unique premade templates to choose from.
  • Options for bulleted, numbered, or plain lists.
  • Customize Width Options: Min/Max Width or 100% Width.
  • Customize Font Size, Font Weight Options.
  • Colors fully customizable.
  • Shadow options.
  • Toggle Show/Hide Options.
  • Exclude the heading option.
  • Smooth scrolling.
  • AMP-compatible.
  • RTL support.

COMPATIBILITY

  • Page Builders like Elementor, Gutanbarg, Beaver Builder & Others Page Builder.
  • WP Rocket.
  • Works with popular AMP plugins.
  • Compatible with All types of SEO Plugin.
  • Rank Math Compatibility Officially Confirmed.

Do you want more features from your wordpress table of contents plugin? Upgrade to the pro version of the “Top Table of Contents” plugin and unlock a world of advanced features!

With the pro version, you’ll get access to:

  • More Eye-Catching & Stunning Premade Templates – Choose from a variety of templates to match your website’s design.
  • Sticky Special TOC On Scroll – Easily navigate your content with the “Sticky Special TOC On Scroll” feature for a seamless reading experience.
  • Floating TOC – Creates a floating TOC that is great for design and navigation. The floating TOC can be positioned anywhere on the page, allowing you to adjust it based on the user’s needs with unlimited color and customization settings. This makes it perfect for long documents that need to provide easy navigation.
  • Floating TOC with Navigation – Navigate the floating TOC without opening it and go to the next or previous section with easy navigation. This feature allows the reader to have a fluid reading experience, allowing them to quickly switch between topics without having to open the table of contents.

  • Progress bar – Let the visitor know where they are in the content with a progress bar at the top. The visitor should be able to see how far they have read in a document. This can help them stay engaged and motivated to complete the content.

  • Customization Panel With Live Preview – Transform your table of contents with the intuitive Customization Panel featuring a live preview for real-time design adjustments.

  • Unlimited Customization Options – Transform your table of contents with endless customization possibilities.
  • Sub-Heading Toggle Options – Expand and collapse subheadings with ease using the versatile Sub-Heading Toggle Options.
  • Active Heading Navigation – Experience seamless navigation with the “Active Heading Navigation” feature.
  • Premium support – Get access to top-notch support from the developers of the plugin.
  • Several other features – Discover a multitude of additional features that enhance your table of contents experience.

Don’t settle for a basic table of contents plugin. Upgrade to the pro version of the “Top Table of Contents” today and elevate your website to the next level!

Get the Pro

View Demo

Read Documentation

Submit Ticket

Made with ❣️ By BoomDevs

If you really like this plugin please don’t forget to give us your rating. Thanks so much! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Privacy Policy

TOP Table Of Contents collects some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

BoomDevs does not gather any data by default. The tracking SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

BoomDevs tracking SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how BoomDevs collects and uses this data.

🚀 Check out our Other Products 🚀

Here are some of our amazing plugins that you can use to boost your WordPress website:

📱 WP Mobile Bottom Menu 📱: Streamline navigation for mobile users, making it easier for them to explore your website on their phones or tablets.

🤖 WP AI CoPilot 🤖: Create content like a pro with the best AI content writer plugin for WordPress. Let AI assist you in crafting engaging and high-quality articles effortlessly.

🎖️ Product Badge Manager For WooCommerce 🎖️: Boost sales by attracting customers with eye-catching promotional product badges. Encourage them to explore and make purchases with confidence.

👥 Tribute Testimonials – WordPress Testimonial Grid/Slider 👥: Build any grid or slider layout using the drag-and-drop Testimonial Builder. Showcase positive feedback from satisfied customers and build trust with your audience.

🔳 Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections 🔳: Unlock the full potential of Elementor with unlimited inner sections. Now, you can create and customize as many inner sections as you desire, giving you complete design freedom.

Support

If you have any questions, please email us at contact@boomdevs.com
sections.installation:
There is no prerequisites for installing TOP Table Of Contents. You can follow the steps below to complete the installation.

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen from your WordPress website dashboard.
  2. Search for TOP Table Of Contents.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it!
sections.faq:
Does the plugin come for free?

Yes, it’s completely free.

Does the Plugin slow down your site?

In reality, The plugin does not make any difference to your visitors’ experience of loading a page.

Is TOP Table Of Contents responsive?

Yep, it’s fully responsive, and also looks & works great on smartphones.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Of course, it is compatible with every WordPress theme.

How to add TOP Table Of Contents to all articles automatically?

By default, It automatically inserts the table of contents to all posts. You can also use the shortcode on a specific post by turning off the auto insert options.

What is the shortcode for inserting TOC on any page?

Using [boomdevs_toc] shortcode, you can insert the TOC on any page.

sections.reviews:
Not GDPR compliant

By Brisch (brisch) on March 28, 2024

Unluckily not possible to use inside the European Union, not GDPR-compliant.
Adds 7 Trackers like Google, DoubleClick, FontAwesone, YouTube, ...

Perfect plugin, and paid version is better

By nathan125 on December 29, 2023

I purchased the paid version (3 licenses), at first I was looking where are settings, but they are available at Customize plugin link which leads you to Customize screen. All is working correctly after testing options. Make sure you purge cache as you test different options. Thank you.

Excellent Plugin

By Devteam HaywoodTech (haywoodtech) on October 3, 2023

This is an Excellent Plugin and with awesome customer support.

You guys nailed it.

Thanks a lot for an amazing plugin.

Best TOC Plugin for wordpress

By swagatam1975 on September 11, 2023

TOP TOC plugin is perhaps the best table of content plugin for wordpress since it fulfills exactly what is expected from it.

Moreover this plugin does not slow down your site like other popular plugins.

Another very useful feature of this plugin is that it is AMP compatible.

I could not find any other popular plugins which are AMP compatible.

It is strange and unfortunate that many of the review sites have not talked about this plugin or rated it as one of the top 5 TOC plugin

Perfect Solution for TOC

By ericpearson148 on February 20, 2023

As a WordPress user, I have tried multiple table of contents plugins, but TOP table of contents plugin stands out from the rest.

A good and useful tool

By cimbian on November 25, 2022

I am using this on a number of sites and it is light on resources and easy to use. Pay heed to the compatibility warnings, though, as it is untested on WordPress version: 6.1.1 and does cause issues. Once it is compatible I will reinstall it.

From all the TOC plugin its the best

By williamloredo on November 8, 2022

I had used all TOC plugins but I have found that this plugin offers better than others. I love this plugin. This plugin deserves more installation

Great premade templates

By Alfred Robinson (alfredrobinson) on September 11, 2022

Truly speaking that I have not seen any other plugin offering this kind of feature yet. I recommend this plugin.

Unique Style

By vaneesssa on April 28, 2022

All though i haven't seen this kind of unique design on any free plugin. Loved the plugin.

short_description: Easily creates SEO-friendly table of contents for your blog posts and pages. Offers both Auto and Manual Insert with highly customization options.
